## Discussion

This property contains the fetch request that identifies the managed objects to delete. # fetchRequest

**Instance Property**

The fetch request that identifies the managed objects to delete.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<any NSFetchRequestResult> { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the fetch request that identifies the managed objects to delete. If you initialize `NSBatchDeleteRequest` with an array of [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSManagedObjectID], Core Data automatically generates a fetch request with a predicate that matches the identifiers in that array.
title: fetchRequest
